title: Punctuation shirt
content:
A gold foil print on a black shirt. Design made up of punctuation marks and typographic symbols.

[Punctuation Foil Shirt](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201172632/http:/www.turnnocturnal.com/product/punctuation-foil)

author: mattmc
